title: Increase visibility of Goals Dashboard instructional text

requirements.summary: Make the dashboard instructional text more visually prominent (without changing its content) and ensure strong contrast in light/dark mode while keeping layout stable above the goal cards.
acceptanceCriteria: The instructional text string remains exactly: "Organize your life: pick a goal (or add a new one) and assign it to the month you want to start crushing it!" (no copy changes).
On the dashboard view, the instructional text is visually more prominent than before (at minimum: increased contrast vs. current text-muted-foreground and/or increased font size).
The instructional text remains readable and appropriately contrasted in both light mode and dark mode.
Layout remains stable: the text still appears above the horizontally scrollable goal cards and does not overlap other UI elements.

file_operations.description:
Update the dashboard view’s instructional text styling (currently a

with "text-sm text-muted-foreground mb-4 font-lora-italic") to be significantly more prominent while keeping the text content exactly the same—e.g., increase font size, switch to a higher-contrast theme-aware text color, add emphasis (font weight), and optionally place it in a subtle theme-aware container (bg/border) that remains readable in both light and dark mode and stays positioned above the horizontally scrollable goal cards.
